title: Rams vs. Chiefs, Aaron Rodgers, and LeBron James
itunes:title: Rams vs. Chiefs, Aaron Rodgers, and LeBron James
description:
Colin is impressed with how quickly the NFL made the changes needed to make the Rams/Chiefs game happen. Colin thinks that the Kansas City Chiefs are the better team despite losing the the Los Angeles Rams and New England Patriots. Colin explains why the relationship between Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers and head coach Mike McCarty doesn't work and Rodgers deserves better. Colin says that the Los Angeles Lakers shouldn't wait a year to add a star player and should get Washington Wizards guard Bradley Beal right now. And Colin gives you his list of who should win the MVP in the NFL. Guests include: Peter King, Greg Cosell, Jarrett Bell and Ty Law

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
